page.title: 07The Inns Of Dent.
page.content: There are two Inns in Dent,one is The Sun Inn, which is about 250 years old, and the other is the George and Dragon,150 years old.Both Inns are situated in the Main Street. The Sun Inn has three bedrooms and it does bed and breakfast at eight pounds per night.It is a very busy pub where local people like to meet after work to find out what's been going on in the community.Tourists also enjoy a friendly pint,a game of dominoes or darts here too.The atmosphere is friendly and inviting. The George and Dragon is a hotel having more bedrooms than The Sun they also do evening meals.This pub attracts younger people for it has a pool table and Space Invader machines. The atmosphere is welcoming and comfortable.Both Inns are steeped in history.
